name: @emkodev/emroute
description: File-based router with triple rendering (SPA, SSR HTML, SSR Markdown). Zero dependencies.
author: emko.dev

tasks.test:browser: deno task test:bundle && deno test test/browser/**/*.test.ts --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --allow-sys
tasks.test:browser:leaf: deno task test:bundle && deno test test/browser/leaf/*.test.ts --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --allow-sys
tasks.test:browser:root: deno task test:bundle && deno test test/browser/root/*.test.ts --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --allow-sys
tasks.test:browser:only: deno task test:bundle && deno test test/browser/only/*.test.ts --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --allow-sys
tasks.test:all: deno test test/unit/*.test.ts & deno test test/browser/**/*.test.ts --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --allow-sys & wait
tasks.test:server: deno task test:bundle && TEST_PORT=4101 deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys test/browser/shared/start-server.ts
tasks.test:server:leaf: deno task test:bundle && TEST_PORT=4102 SPA_MODE=leaf deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys test/browser/shared/start-server.ts
tasks.test:server:root: deno task test:bundle && TEST_PORT=4103 SPA_MODE=root deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys test/browser/shared/start-server.ts
tasks.test:server:only: deno task test:bundle && TEST_PORT=4104 SPA_MODE=only deno run --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-run --allow-env --allow-sys test/browser/shared/start-server.ts
tasks.test:bundle: deno task test:bundle:emroute && deno task test:bundle:widgets && deno task test:bundle:app
